body: i don understand the language, but this is my shit. innocent people taken advantage of, and raped and they having no clue about it. man i love this premise, but most of the stories with this kinda setting in this site is usually loli, which is not my thing. this is one of those rare ones, where it's a milf. thats why i like it. a good substitute for it, are those emotionless mind control milf ones, better if it includes shota and it's a mom son scenario, maybe that's why kings app turned me on so much. but that's not exactly what i want, THIS one is what i want however the artstyle is not the best, but an A for the effort considering it was drawn on phone damn.
